settings.editor: Excited to get into a world of Interface design? In this course, you will learn how to create professional digital experiences from A to Z.
Alex Crowly. The Multidisciplinary Designer, currently Lead User Interface Designer at moopy.com

Hi, I am Alex, the lead designer at moopy.com. This course will uncover all UI/UX design process steps and what to do to create bright and successful user interfaces. You will find out how to become an expert in UI/UX by exploring different techniques, following each stage, from user research to implementation.

slides.content:
I’m super-inspired by Alex Crowly, the way
she presents the information really gives you
a wide view of the field, which helps you to understand all the processes well.
I really like it!
slides.name: — Amanda Borkin—

slides.content: The course focuses on qualitative and quantitative research methods. It is very informative and great for complete beginners in UX research. Highly recommended!
slides.name: — John Laurens—
